content: I'm thinking of rearranging the furniture in my living room again, but I want to make sure I have enough space for everything. Can you help me create a floor plan to visualize the layout? By the way, two Sundays ago, my sister and I spent the afternoon watching TV on the couch, and we binge-watched three episodes of our favorite show - it was really comfortable, but I'm worried the current layout might not be the best.
